code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{pullHints}from'../functions/questionFunctions';import _ from'lodash';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hint=props=>{const{verb,index}=props;useEffect(()=>{const divArr=document.getElementsByClassName('hint-title');for(let div of divArr){let divContents=div.nextElementSibling;div.addEventListener('click',()=>divContents.classList.toggle('hidden'));}});const hintB=()=>{const hint=pullHints(verb.tense,verb.infinitiveP);if(hint)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:hint});else return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"no-hint",children:"N/A"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"hint-".concat(index),className:"hint-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hint",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hint-title",children:"Hint 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hint-contents hidden",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"".concat(_.upperCase(verb.tense)," // ").concat(_.capitalize(verb.infinitiveP))})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hint",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hint-title",children:"Hint 2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hint-contents hidden",children:hintB()})]})]});};export default Hint;
